description: Knowledge base of PlayQ default Web automation commands (core, non-addon) with syntax, description, and examples for Copilot-assisted test authoring.

commands.name: Open Browser
commands.description: Launches a browser and opens the specified URL. Options may include browserType and headless.

commands.name: Navigate By Path
commands.description: Navigates to a relative path from the current base URL. Options can enable screenshots.

commands.name: Click Button
commands.description: Clicks a button located by label, text, aria-label, or custom locator metadata.

commands.name: Click Link
commands.description: Clicks a hyperlink using visible text or locator hints.

commands.name: Click Radio Button
commands.description: Selects a radio button by label or value.

commands.name: Click Checkbox
commands.description: Toggles a checkbox by label or name.

commands.name: Mouseover Link
commands.description: Hovers the mouse over a link element.

commands.name: Fill Input
commands.description: Clears and types a value into an input element.

commands.name: Fill Generic
commands.description: Fills any editable element with the provided value.

commands.name: Verify Header Text
commands.description: Verifies a page header matches expected text.

commands.name: Verify Page Title
commands.description: Checks the browser tab title equals expected text.

commands.name: Wait For Input State
commands.description: Waits until an input becomes enabled or disabled.

commands.name: Wait For Text At Location
commands.syntax: Web: Wait for Text at Location -field:{string} -text:{string} -options:{json}
commands.description: Waits until text appears at the specified locator.
commands.example: * Web: Wait for Text at Location -field:"#status" -text:"Completed" -options:"{}"

commands.name: Click Tab
commands.description: Activates a tab by its label.

commands.name: Select Dropdown
commands.description: Selects a dropdown option by visible text or value.

commands.name: Verify Text On Page
commands.description: Checks that the given text exists anywhere on the page.

commands.name: Verify Text At Location
commands.description: Verifies text content of a specific locator matches expected value.

commands.name: Verify Input Field Present
commands.syntax: Web: Verify input field is present -field:{string} -options:{json}
commands.description: Asserts that an input element is present on the page.
commands.example: * Web: Verify input field is present -field:"Search" -options:"{}"

commands.name: Verify Input Field Value
commands.description: Checks an input's current value matches expected.

commands.name: Verify Tab Field Present
commands.description: Confirms a tab element is visible.

commands.name: Verify Toast Text Contains
commands.description: Verifies a toast/notification contains expected substring.

commands.name: Wait For URL
commands.description: Waits until the current URL matches expected.

commands.name: Press Key
commands.description: Presses a keyboard key against the active element.
